00021 #include "CDFData.h"
00022 #include "DataSet.h"
00023 #include "CDFQCProbeSetInformation.h"
00024 #include "CDFQCProbeInformation.h"
00025 
00026 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00027 
00028 CDFQCProbeSetInformation::CDFQCProbeSetInformation()
00029 {
00030         dataSet = 0;
00031 }
00032 
00033 CDFQCProbeSetInformation::~CDFQCProbeSetInformation()
00034 {
00035         if (dataSet)
00036         {
00037                 dataSet->Close();
00038                 dataSet->Delete();
00039         }
00040 }
00041 
00042 /*
00043  * Get the QC type - DataSet name
00044  */
00045 std::wstring CDFQCProbeSetInformation::GetQCProbeSetType() const
00046 {
00047         return dataSet->Header().GetName();
00048 }
00049 
00050 /*
00051  * Get the number of cells in the probe set - number of rows in the DataSet
00052  */
00053 int32_t CDFQCProbeSetInformation::GetNumCells() const
00054 {
00055         if (dataSet == 0)
00056                 return 0;
00057         return dataSet->Rows();
00058 }
00059 
00060 void CDFQCProbeSetInformation::SetDataSet(DataSet* ds)
00061 {
00062         if (dataSet)
00063         {
00064                 dataSet->Close();
00065                 dataSet->Delete();
00066         }
00067 
00068         dataSet = ds;
00069         dataSet->Open();
00070 }
00071 
00072 /*
00073  * Get information for the probe by index
00074  */
00075 void CDFQCProbeSetInformation::GetProbeInformation(int32_t cell_index, CDFQCProbeInformation& info)
00076 {
00077         if (cell_index < 0 || cell_index >= dataSet->Rows())
00078                 return;
00079 
00080         info.CopyFromDataSet(dataSet, cell_index);
00081 }
